member.name: IWbemHiPerfEnum.AddObjects
member.summary: The IWbemHiPerfEnum.AddObjects method adds the supplied instance objects to the enumerator.
member.param: Number of items in the object and the number of identifiers in the parameter.
Pointer to an array of integers that contains a unique identifier for each object in the object array.
Pointer to an array of instance objects to add to the enumerator.
member.returns: This method returns an HRESULT indicating the status of the method call. The following list lists the value contained within an HRESULT.

member.name: IWbemHiPerfEnum.GetObjects
member.summary: TheIWbemHiPerfEnum.GetObjects method retrieves objects currently residing in the enumerator.
member.param: Size of the array passed to this method in the apObj parameter.
Pointer that holds the reference to an array of objects, which contains the returned objects. The array must be big enough to hold all objects in the enumerator.
Pointer to a ULONG used to return the number of objects placed in the array.
member.returns: This method returns an HRESULT indicating the status of the method call. The following list lists the value contained within an HRESULT.

member.name: IWbemHiPerfEnum.RemoveAll
member.summary: TheIWbemHiPerfEnum.RemoveAll method empties all objects from the enumerator.
member.returns: This method returns WBEM_S_NO_ERROR if successful.

member.name: IWbemHiPerfEnum.RemoveObjects
member.summary: TheIWbemHiPerfEnum.RemoveObjects method removes objects (identified by their refresher identifiers) from a refresher.
member.param: Pointer to an array of integers that contains the refresher identifiers of the objects to remove.
member.returns: This method returns an HRESULT indicating the status of the method call. The following list lists the value contained within an HRESULT.

summary.para: TheIWbemHiPerfEnum interface is used in refresher operations to provide rapid access to enumerations of instance objects. WMI provides an implementation of this interface, which it passes to providers when is called, and it returns to clients when is called.

Client applications can call only the method of this interface. Attempts by client applications to call the otherIWbemHiPerfEnum methods return WBEM_E_ACCESS_DENIED. Providers call these other methods to update the enumerators whenever a client calls.
summary.div: Note This interface is not implemented by the user or by a provider under any circumstances. The implementation provided by WMI is the only one supported.
